type.name: org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.GenerateEclipseWtpComponent
type.description:
Generates the org.eclipse.wst.common.component settings file for Eclipse WTP. If you want to fine tune the eclipse configuration

At this moment nearly all configuration is done via EclipseWtpComponent.

method.name: getComponent
method.description: The Eclipse WTP component model that contains details required to generate the settings file.

property.name: component
property.description: The Eclipse WTP component model that contains details required to generate the settings file.
